程序包 org.diku.dms.bds_project

类 EdgePartition<ED>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diku.dms.bds_project.EdgePartition<ED>
  • 类型参数:
    ED - the edge attribute type.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    EdgeTripletPartition
    public class EdgePartition<ED>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    EdgePartition stores a collection of edges. The edges are stored in columnar format in `localSrcIds`, `localDstIds` and `data`. All vertex ids are mapped to a compact set of local vertex ids according to the `global2local` map. `local2global` maps local vertex ids to global vertex ids. The edges are clustered by source vertex id, and the mapping from global vertex id to the index of the corresponding edge cluster is stored in `index`.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EdgePartition

        public EdgePartition​(int[] localSrcIds,
                     int[] localDstIds,
                     ED[] data,
                     java.util.Map<VertexId,​java.lang.Integer> index,
                     java.util.Map<VertexId,​java.lang.Integer> global2local,
                     VertexId[] local2global)
        参数:
        localSrcIds - the local source vertex id of each edge as an index into `local2global`
        localDstIds - the local destination vertex id of each edge as an index into `local2global`
        data - the attribute associated with each edge
        index - the clustered index on source vertex id as a map from each global source vertex id to the offset in the edge arrays where the cluster for that vertex id begins
        global2local - a mapping from global vertex id to referenced vertex id
        local2global - a mapping from local vertex to global vertex id

      • degrees

        public java.util.Iterator<scala.Tuple2<VertexId,​java.lang.Long>> degrees()
        返回:
        the iterator of tuples, which contains a vertex id with the total degree of that vertex
